job_history.work_description: Worked as Graduate Research Assistant performing the duties of Database Programmer/Analyst at Application Development Network (ADN), DoIT which supports University of Missouri System faculty and students through agile and rapid creation of new applications.

projects.description: This project is all about requesting, scheduling the tutoring sessions.
The goal of the project to allow the admins, managers, scrum masters of the organization to keep track various applications which includes their developed, ongoing and future projects.
The goal of this project is to allow GoMizzou Staff to edit the master tables involved with the GoMizzou webservices.
The goal of the project is to develop a web application for Checkout process similar to shopping cart for various departments who met the certain rules.
The goal of the project to give students to customize their outlook email.
